title: Daily Deals of The Day Today Only, Sling Bag for Men Women, Shoulder Backpack Chest Bags Hiking Daypacks
author: N/A
description:
➤[ Small in size with roomy compartment ] Size :30x18x5cm /11.8x7x2in . Large main pocket can fits up to 7.9 inch Tablets. Small zippered pocket for phones,power bank,wallet or outdoor/travel sundries. Zipper front pocket for your card/small items that require easy access.
➤[ Free Your Hand and Pockets ] Shoulder strap is adjustables to meet different requirements for both men and women. Store just what you needs to carry without stuffing your pants pockets. Keep your pockets (and hands) free, everything you can imagining a man carrying every day goes into this bag. It can also be used as a small diaper bag
➤[ Multi-purpose Small Sling ] Easy sling bag is fits for shorter bike rides or outdoor walking. Multipurpose perfectly works as men womens wallet purse, shoulder bag, chest pack, travel bag, outdoor sports bag (hiking, camping, climbing, cycling, walking, etc) in casual daily life. This compact small body bags will be also a great gift for everyone.
➤[Material]: We are chosen purpose Polyurethane fabric, lightweight design, and durability, not easy to tear
➤[Earphone hole] with earphone hole design on the top of this sling bag, providing easy access to your earphones, no need to keep your smartphone on hand or pocket when listening music
